entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Kuujjuarapik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:51 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -10.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kuujjuarapik Airport 3:00 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -10.8°C
Pressure: 99.6 kPa
Visibility: 1.0 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -12.4°C
Wind: SSW 28 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Blizzard. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending overnight then flurries. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
